attributes.action: Withdraw all British Troops from conflict in the Middle East
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see the Government remove all troops from the Middle East because they are short of manpower and I feel that Britain is too close to America and middle eastern conflict is not in Britains best interests.

We have not got the defences like we used to to start military action in the middle east.
